/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and journey. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The road itself is devoid of any vehicles or pedestrians, adding a sense of tranquility to the scene. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
